version_description: Minor updates
Minor updates

Pay in shops using your smartphone without needing your bank card.
Pay by MobilePay in shops where you see QR codes bearing the KBC logo. It’s speedy, secure and simple to use.

Pay in shops using your smartphone without needing your bank card.
Pay by MobilePay in shops where you see QR codes bearing the KBC logo. It’s speedy, secure and simple to use.

- Manage your debit and credit cards: temporarily deactivate your card for use in certain countries, change limits and disable online payments
- Use MobilePay to make and receive payments to or from the Bancontact app or other banks' apps supporting this feature
- Pay in the shops or online stores without your bank card card by simply scanning a KBC or Bancontact QR code
- Check that you’re eligible for the full tax break under your Pricos pension savings plan and top it up at the tap of a finger

- Manage your debit and credit cards: temporarily deactivate your card for use in certain countries, change limits and disable online payments
- Use MobilePay to make and receive payments to or from the Bancontact app or other banks' apps supporting this feature
- Pay in the shops or online stores without your bank card card by simply scanning a KBC or Bancontact QR code
- Check that you’re eligible for the full tax break under your Pricos pension savings plan and top it up at the tap of a finger

Signing transactions just got even easier!
Our Mobile app now lets you log in and sign transactions using your thumbprint or fingerprint. Secure banking at your fingertips.

Minor updates.

Signing transactions just got even easier!
Our Mobile app now lets you log in and sign transactions using your thumbprint or fingerprint. Secure banking at your fingertips.

Minor updates.

– Launch the KBC Sign app to log in to Touch and Online for Business and sign transactions quickly and securely without needing a card reader
– Open a KBC Savings Account or KBC Start2Save Account right from your smartphone or set up one of our pension savings plans online in just a few taps
– Make appointments, receive messages in your inbox and see a financial to-do list under 'Actions’'

– Launch the KBC Sign app to log in to Touch and Online for Business and sign transactions quickly and securely without needing a card reader
– Open a KBC Savings Account or KBC Start2Save Account right from your smartphone or set up one of our pension savings plans online in just a few taps
– Make appointments, receive messages in your inbox and see a financial to-do list under 'Actions’'

- Payconiq is a new smartphone app that lets you make payments straight from your phone. Borrowed money from a friend? Or forgotten your cash?
Pay it in a snap with Payconiq. KBC clients can link their KBC accounts quickly and securely to Payconiq. Discover the benefits!

- Payconiq is a new smartphone app that lets you make payments straight from your phone. Borrowed money from a friend? Or forgotten your cash?
Pay it in a snap with Payconiq. KBC clients can link their KBC accounts quickly and securely to Payconiq. Discover the benefits!

Pay it in a snap with Payconiq. KBC clients can link their KBC accounts quickly and securely to Payconiq. Discover the benefits!

- Make paper-based transfers with your smartphone using 'Scan transfer'. Just quickly check and confirm the details on your screen and you're done!

As a regular KBC Mobile user, you've provided us with interesting feedback, for which we thank you!
We're already busy doing what we can to make KBC Mobile even better.

What's new?

- Bank on the go with the new-look KBC Mobile app.
- See your current travel insurance plus added cover you might want for fuller peace of mind and get personalised suggestions on the best insurance for your travels.
- Sign certain types of documents digitally (once you've arranged this with your branch).

If you have more tips, remarks or ideas, be sure to let us know on Facebook or Twitter @KBC_BE.

We've made some great new minor and major improvements to KBC Mobile, all thanks to your feedback!

New in this update
-See your savings and investments even more clearly
-Apply for a prepaid card and load or unload it
-Get a replacement for a lost or defective card
-Open a security deposit savings account for rented accommodation

Get tips and share your thoughts and ideas with us on Facebook or Twitter @KBC_BE.

-Saving for your own or your children’s future just got even easier with KBC Mobile. Set up an investment plan.
-Stay safe online. Discover our Internet Protection Insurance as well as our Cybersecurity Service
- Fear not if your heating packs give in or you’ve got a leak. Get our home response service, KBC Home Assistance
-Use Siri’s voice recognition capabilities to transfer money

Get tips and share your thoughts and ideas with us on Facebook or Twitter @KBC _BE.

– If direct debit or credit card payments are due to be debited from your account, you can now get alerted to this by push notification.
- Calculate KBC Home Insurance in just 3 steps to quickly see what it’ll cost you.
- Get transaction statements easily as PDF files
- See your direct debits clearly and change or cancel them if needed
- View insurance and other documents sent to you through Zoomit

– If direct debit or credit card payments are due to be debited from your account, you can now get alerted to this by push notification.
- Calculate KBC Home Insurance in just 3 steps to quickly see what it’ll cost you.
- Get transaction statements easily as PDF files
- See your direct debits clearly and change or cancel them if needed
- View insurance and other documents sent to you through Zoomit

Thanks to your feedback, our KBC Mobile app just got even better with some great new features.

- Buy train tickets from SNCB right from the app
- Open an extra account easily on your phone
- Get added budget flexibility and set whether you can go overdrawn on your account
- Round up and invest your spare change

Share your thoughts and ideas with us on Facebook or Twitter @KBC_BE

We've added some great new features to KBC Mobile. Be sure to download the latest version!

-Pay stylishly and contactless with a wearable
-Discover our new additional services
-Apply digitally for your renovation loan
-Make an additional investment in your portfolio even more easily
-Reserve the rate offered in your company-vehicle loan simulation

Share your thoughts and ideas with us on Facebook or Twitter @KBC_BE.

KBC Mobile welcomes yet another hot service: Goal Alert.

Get alerted on your phone as soon as something important happens in matches in the Belgian Top Division. And that’s not all! Goal Alert gives you immediate access to action replays during the match. And if you miss something, you can always watch all game highlights at the end of each match day.

Be sure to download the latest version!
Share your thoughts and ideas with us on Facebook or Twitter @KBC_BE.

KBC Mobile welcomes yet another hot service: Goal Alert.

Get alerted on your phone as soon as something important happens in matches in the Belgian Top Division. And that’s not all! Goal Alert gives you immediate access to action replays during the match. And if you miss something, you can always watch all game highlights at the end of each match day.

Be sure to download the latest version!
